EmailTemplate.subject: Control for OpenStack: Operations Manager 4.7 Has Arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=}}, Today, VMTurbo announces General Availability of Operations Manager 4.7, the world's only unified control system for cloud and virtual environments. This version introduces instrumentation for OpenStack <http://vmturbo.com/product/cloud-management-software?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=v47>, as well as a host of capabilities that will improve your ability to acheive and maintain the Desired State of your environment:
- OpenStack & KVM Control <http://vmturbo.com/product/cloud-management-software?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=v47> - Hyper-V HA & Maintenance Mode Control - Future Workload Reservations - Promote Resource Pools to vDCs - Custom Dashboard Enhancements - UI to PDF Enhancements - VM Template Resizing in Planner - And More... Learn About Upgrading <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/community/customer-access/blog/2014/08/01/how-to-perform-a-vmturbo-operations-manager-offline-update?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=v47> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
